name: Food Chain: Ocean Predators
description:
Want to participate in the food chain? Join other players in the ongoing struggle of living in the ocean. Consume smaller prey to grow in size and accumulate evolution points. Use evolution points to morph into larger species and gain a new variety of prey to consume. Use the environment to help avoid larger predators. Rocks, seaweed, and coral formations can all be used to conceal you from others. Can you survive life in the food chain?

Features:
*Play in a relaxing single player mode or an intense multi player pvp game mode
*A large selection of prey to consume including turtles, clown fish, jelly fish, octopus, puffer fish
*Morph into larger species including angler fish, dolphin, shark, and killer whale
*Explore a vast ocean environment and use it to your advantage.
